short_summary: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on March 7, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Health Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a environmental conditions monitoring system including delivery, installation, training and maintenance located in Longueuil, Qu\u00e9bec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
description: TPSGC, au nom Sant\u00e9 Canada publie cette demande de proposition pour l\u2019achat d\u2019un syst\u00e8me de surveillance des conditions environnementales incluant livraison, installation, formation et entretien situ\u00e9 \u00e0 Longueuil, Qu\u00e9bec, Canada, selon les modalit\u00e9s figurant \u00e0 l\u2019annexe A.
duration_in_months: What will it end date be?
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
---
**Tender Announcement for Environmental Conditions Monitoring System**

[#] **Reference Number:** WS3822806557-Doc3839477071

[#] **Tender Closing Date:** 14:00 EST, March 7, 2023

**Notice Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in association with Health Canada, invites sealed bids for the acquisition of an environmental conditions monitoring system. TheBidder must submit their tender electronically through Ariba Discovery.

**Notice Content**

*   **Categorization:** Environmental Monitoring Services
    *   Mandatory requirements for the system are outlined in the tender document.
    *   Key attributes include data logging, data display, signal conditioning of multipledata sources, and secure communication.
    *   Bidders are expected to provide their solutions that meet the specified requirements.
*   **Eligibility Standards**
    *   Ariba's standards will be applied for contractor qualifications.
    *   Time zone details will be supplied with this notification.
*   **Submission Guidelines**
    *   Bidders will submit a complete bid electronically via Ariba Discovery.
    *   Late or incomplete bids will be accepted as non-responsive.
    *   Bids will be evaluated based on **Lowest Price**.

**Bid Content**

All prospective bidders must submit their bid electronically through Ariba Discovery.

Please verify your jurisdiction to offer goods and services as per the Ariba Terms of Association. Please see the requirements to be complied with in tender activities.

**Contact Information**

To access this competitive tender, you can visit the [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15304741?extsite=MTUzMDQ3NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) webpage and follow instructions to obtain the RFx document.

---
